mapper.select: select sellercrn from seller where sellerId=#{sellerId}

select salesname, sum(salesprice*salesquantity) price
from sales where sellerCRN=#{sellerCRN} and TO_CHAR(salestime,'yy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yy/mm/dd') group by salesname

select TO_CHAR(salestime,'yy/mm/dd')salestime, sum(salesprice*salesquantity) price
from sales where sellerCRN=#{sellerCRN} group by TO_CHAR(salestime,'yy/mm/dd') order by salestime
select salesname,sum(salesQuantity) as Quantity from sales where sellercrn=#{sellerCRN} group by salesname
select salesname,sum(salesQuantity) as Quantity from sales where sellercrn=#{sellerCRN} and TO_CHAR(salestime,'yy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yy/mm/dd') group by salesname
